ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Service locating shall be conducted in form of DBYD and service location
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: DBYD Service Locator, Service Chart

FREQUENCY: Prior to Commenciing any Activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure excavation permit has been obtained for the specified tasks
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to Commenciing any Activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All materials shall comply as per technical specification, Ensure materials are not damaged
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to Commenciing any Activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure location of bollards conforms to design drawings, Mark hole centre position at location
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Care shall be taken in excavation, Hole shall be minimum 600mm dia and 1000mm in depth
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure base is supported by solid ground, and block is level
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: EAB cage shall be placed level
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure minimum clearances are provided, no foreign materials are present, and EAB cartridge is level
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 32MPa concrete shall be placed to cover reinforcement cage and fill hole
○ Concrete shall be compacted by use of vibrator
○ If surface pavers are to be used, allow 25mm gap from finished surface
○ Ensure reo cage is level post compaction
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure bollard is installed, and bolts are tightened adequately if required, Concrete, pavers or bitumen shall be finished to specified requirements
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
